journal-meta.journal-title: The American Journal of Sports Medicine

permissions.copyright-holder: American Orthopaedic Society for Sports Medicine

abstract.p: Lee DH, Lee KB, Jung ST, Seon JK, Kim MS, Sung IH. Comparison of early versus delayed weightbearing outcomes after microfracture for small to midsized osteochondral lesions of the talus. Am J Sports Med. 2012;40(9):2023-2028. (Original DOI: 10.1177/0363546512455316)

body.p: The images in Figures 2 and 3 are interchanged in this article. The corrected figures are shown below.

caption.p: Time courses of postoperative American Orthopaedic Foot and Ankle Society (AOFAS) ankle-hindfoot scores for the early and delayed weightbearing groups after arthroscopic microfracture. Error bars represent standard deviations.
Time courses of postoperative visual analog scale (VAS) scores for the early and delayed weightbearing groups after arthroscopic microfracture. Error bars represent standard deviations.
